summary: This document appears to be an email chain forwarding a summary of allegations from a victim's account. It describes multiple incidents of inappropriate touching and sexual misconduct by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, including in a movie theater and at a property in New Mexico. The summary includes details of physical contact, coercion, and the victim's fear and discomfort.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described as initiating inappropriate physical contact (hand-holding, caressing, foot rubbing) with the victim during a movie, and later climbing into bed and spooning with the victim.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Alleged to have given the victim a nude massage, been present during foot massages, and participated in inappropriate touching with Epstein.

persons.name: Mike Baker
persons.context: Appears as the sender or forwarder of the email containing the allegations.

connections.description: Both are described as jointly participating in inappropriate activities with the victim, including being on a bed together with her and both initiating contact.
They are together with the victim in multiple settings (movie theater, New Mexico property, bed).
Epstein is alleged to have touched, caressed, and spooned with the victim without her consent, causing fear and discomfort.
Maxwell is alleged to have given the victim a nude massage and participated in inappropriate touching.

events.title: Movie Theater Incident in NYC
events.description: Epstein and the victim went to see a movie ("12 Monkeys"). During the movie, Epstein held the victim's hand, caressed it, touched her shoe, and rubbed her foot, making her feel uncomfortable.

events.title: Incidents at New Mexico Property
events.description: Multiple alleged incidents occurred, including foot massages with Maxwell (with pointers on how Epstein likes it), more movie theater petting/touching, Epstein climbing into bed for spooning and touching, and Maxwell giving the victim a nude massage with Epstein present.

events.title: Bed Incident with Epstein and Maxwell
events.description: The victim was on a bed with both Epstein and Maxwell, was asked to give a foot massage, and both Epstein and Maxwell started touching her. The victim became afraid of rape and ran away.

locations: New York City (NYC) - location of movie theater incident
New Mexico (NM) - location of property where multiple alleged incidents occurred
keyFacts: A victim describes Jeffrey Epstein initiating unwanted physical contact (hand-holding, caressing, foot rubbing) during a movie date, causing her confusion and discomfort.
At a property in New Mexico, Ghislaine Maxwell gave the victim pointers on how to perform foot massages 'how Epstein likes it' and later gave the victim a nude massage.
Epstein climbed into bed with the victim for spooning and touching, and on another occasion, both Epstein and Maxwell were on a bed with the victim, leading her to fear rape and run away.
The document is a forwarded email summary of allegations, dated November 13, 2019, indicating these accounts were being circulated among investigators or journalists.
